list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: add query and handler for verifying user existence by username
- Introduced `VerifyIfUserExistsByUsernameQuery` to facilitate user existence checks. - Added `VerifyUserExistsByUsernameQueryHandler` for handling the query logic.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Docker.tournament: Compose Deployment.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.All in rest-api_10.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.http-requests-log | #1.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.http-requests-log | #6.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.http-requests-log | #7.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.http-requests-log | #8.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.rest-api_10 | #1.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.rest-api_11 | #1.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.rest-api_9 | #1.executor": "Run", "JavaScript Debug.127.0.0.1:8080.executor": "Debug", "JavaScript Debug.127.0.0.1:8081.executor": "Debug", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "feature/novos-endpoints-externos", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/bruno/Documents/42SP/42_transcendence/user-service/src/Domain/Queries/Handlers", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "npm.build.executor": "Run", "npm.clean:dist.executor": "Run", "npm.start (1).executor": "Run", "npm.start.executor": "Debug", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "ts.external.directory.path": "/home/bruno/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/webstorm/plugins/javascript-plugin/jsLanguageServicesImpl/external" } }

task.summary: Default task

feat: add user existence verification via UUIDs endpoint
- Introduced `/user/exists` GET route to verify user existence by UUIDs with input validation. - Added `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsDTO` and `VerificationService` for handling new functionality. - Updated `UserRepository` with methods to validate user existence by UUID or username arrays.

feat: add `VerificationService`, `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsDTO`, and update paths in tsconfig
- Introduced `VerificationService` to handle user existence verification logic. - Added `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsDTO` for querying user existence by UUIDs. - Updated TypeScript configuration paths to ensure proper module resolution.

feat: add `VerificationService`, `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsDTO`, and update paths in tsconfig
- Introduced `VerificationService` to handle user existence verification logic. - Added `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsDTO` for querying user existence by UUIDs. - Updated TypeScript configuration paths to ensure proper module resolution.

refactor: relocate query/command handlers and update import statements
- Moved `BaseHandlerQuery` and `BaseHandlerCommand` from `Application` to `Domain` layer. - Updated `NotificationError` imports to remove `.js` extensions for consistency.

feat: implement `CreateHistory` command handling with validation and repository integration
- Added `CreateHistoryCommandHandler` for processing `CreateHistoryCommand`. - Introduced `CreateHistoryDTO` and related `fromDTO` conversion method. - Created `CreateHistoryValidator` to validate command inputs and ensure user existence via `BackendApiClient`. - Updated relevant import paths and repository logic for new functionality.

refactor: relocate tournament commands/handlers/validators to `Domain` layer and update imports
- Moved `CreateTournamentValidator`, `DeleteTournamentCommand`, `CreateTournamentCommand`, and related handlers to the `Domain` layer. - Updated import paths throughout the affected files for consistency. - Adjusted error handling in `CreateTournamentValidator` to use `InternalBackendApiErrorVerifyUserExists`.

refactor: relocate `EditTournament` and `DeleteTournament` commands/handlers/validators to `Domain` layer
- Moved `EditTournamentCommand`, `EditTournamentCommandHandler`, `EditTournamentCommandValidator`, `DeleteTournamentCommand`, `DeleteUserCommandValidator`, and their handlers to the `Domain` layer. - Updated import paths across affected files for consistency and alignment with project structure.

feat: add new errors to `ErrorCatalog` and enhance `GetAllTournamentQueryHandler`
- Added `InvalidNumberOfParticipantsHistory` and `HistoryNotFound` errors in `ErrorCatalog`. - Updated `InternalBackendApiError` message for `verifyUserExists` endpoint. - Introduced `GetAllHistoryDTO` for handling username-based query logic. - Adjusted import paths in `GetAllTournamentQueryHandler` for consistency.

refactor: relocate query objects to `Domain` layer and update imports
- Moved `GetAllTournamentsQuery`, `GetTournamentQuery`, and other query objects to `Domain` layer. - Added `GetHistoryQuery` for handling username-based query logic. - Updated import paths across affected files for consistency.

refactor: relocate query handlers, validators to `Domain`, add `History` entity and update imports
- Moved `GetTournamentQueryHandler`, `GetUserQueryValidator`, and related logic to `Domain` layer. - Added `History` entity for managing tournament history details. - Updated import paths across affected modules for consistency.

feat: implement `HistoryService` with `Create` method, add `History` and `MatchMaking` models to Prisma schema
- Introduced `HistoryService` to manage tournament history creation and processing. - Added `History` and `MatchMaking` models to `tournament.prisma` schema for tracking matches and histories. - Updated `backend.prisma` schema formatting for consistency.

feat: add new errors to `ErrorCatalog` and update history validation logic
- Added `PlayerCantPlayAgainstSelf` and `NegativePoints` errors to `ErrorCatalog` for enhanced validation. - Renamed `GetAllHistoryDTO` and `GetHistoryQuery` to `GetAllHistoriesDTO` and `GetAllHistoriesQuery`. - Updated `CreateHistoryValidator` to enforce validation for self-play and negative points.

feat: add `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler`, `GetAllHistoriesViewModel`, and DTO for history retrieval
- Implemented `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler` to handle history retrieval by username. - Added `GetAllHistoriesViewModel` for mapping DTO data to a user-friendly format. - Introduced `GetAllHistoriesQueryDTO` to structure history query data. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: add `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler`, `GetAllHistoriesViewModel`, and DTO for history retrieval
- Implemented `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler` to handle history retrieval by username. - Added `GetAllHistoriesViewModel` for mapping DTO data to a user-friendly format. - Introduced `GetAllHistoriesQueryDTO` to structure history query data. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: implement `GetAllHistories` in `HistoryService` and update `GetAllTournamentsDTO`
- Added `GetAll` method in `HistoryService` to retrieve tournament histories based on username. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: implement `GetAllHistories` in `HistoryService` and update `GetAllTournamentsDTO`
- Added `GetAll` method in `HistoryService` to retrieve tournament histories based on username. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: integrate `BackendApiClient` for user validation and win/lose tracking
- Added `BackendApiClient` to `CreateHistoryCommandHandler` for tracking user win/lose metrics. - Renamed methods in `BackendApiClient` for consistency (`verifyUserExists` to `VerifyIfUsersExists`). - Introduced `AddWinLoseForUser` method in `BackendApiClient`. - Updated validators to use the newly renamed methods.

feat: add matchmaking-related DTOs, query objects, and new validation errors
- Introduced `GenerateMatchmakingDTO`, `GenerateMatchmakingQuery`, and `GenerateMatchmakingQueryDTO` for matchmaking logic. - Added `NegativeWins` error to `ErrorCatalog` for validation of win values. - Updated `ErrorCatalog` messages for consistency in backend API error naming.

refactor: rename method in `IBackendApiClient` and update logs for clarity
- Renamed `verifyUserExists` to `VerifyIfUsersExists` in `IBackendApiClient` for consistency. - Enhanced error logging in `index.ts` for better debugging. - Minor formatting updates in `HistoryRepository`.

feat: implement matchmaking controller, view model, and query handlers
- Added `MatchmakingController` with matchmaking logic and integration via `GenerateMatchmakingDTO`. - Introduced `GenerateMatchmakingViewModel` to structure matchmaking data. - Implemented `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and `GenerateMatchmakingQueryValidator` for query processing and validation.

feat: add matchmaking service, user search method, and update routes
- Implemented `MatchmakingService` with preliminary `Generate` logic. - Added `SearchForClosestOpponent` method in `UserRepository` for matchmaking user search based on win ratio and matches played. - Updated `UserRoutes` with corrected endpoint `/users/exists`. - Extended `NotificationError` with `SetAllErrorsToString` method for better error handling.

chore: add missing newline and leave TODO for additional validators
- Fixed missing newline in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryValidator.ts`. - Added a TODO placeholder to include validators for additional getters.
chore: add TODO placeholders for unimplemented methods in `BackendApiClient`

feat: enhance matchmaking logic in `UserRepository` and add `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO`
- Updated `SearchForClosestOpponent` to refine candidate selection based on win ratio differences. - Implemented a fallback `SearchForAnyOpponent` method for broader matchmaking. - Added `mapToUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` for structured matchmaking data mapping. - Introduced `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` to support detailed matchmaking query responses.

feat: update matchmaking DTOs and queries to support total games and username
- Replaced `uuid` with `username` in `GenerateMatchmakingDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingQuery`. - Added `totalGames` property to DTOs and queries for enhanced matchmaking logic. - Updated `BackendApiClient` with new methods for user verification and opponent search. - Added `NegativeValues` error to `ErrorCatalog` for input validation.

refactor: replace `HistoryRepository` with `BackendApiClient` in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and update validation
- Updated `Handler` to use `BackendApiClient` for opponent search and user validation. - Extended input validation to include `totalGames` check. - Replaced `uuid` with `username` in user validation and opponent search methods.

refactor: replace `HistoryRepository` with `BackendApiClient` in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and update validation
- Updated `Handler` to use `BackendApiClient` for opponent search and user validation. - Extended input validation to include `totalGames` check. - Replaced `uuid` with `username` in user validation and opponent search methods.

refactor: simplify `SearchForClosestOpponent` and enhance `MatchmakingService`
- Removed unnecessary `paremterLoses` parameter from `SearchForClosestOpponent`. - Refactored `MatchmakingService` to include enhanced query validation and error handling. - Updated `Generate` method to return detailed matchmaking results using `GetUserMatchmakingViewModel`.
refactor: remove unused `GenerateMatchmakingQueryDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingViewModel` classes

refactor: switch matchmaking input from body to query parameters
- Updated `GenerateMatchmaking` method in `MatchmakingController` to use query parameters instead of request body. - Adjusted `MatchmakingRoutes` to reflect the new query-based input. - Enhanced input validation with querystring schema in `MatchmakingRoutes`.
CHORE: arquivos trazidos do ultimo merge
CHORE: arquivos trazidos do ultimo merge

refactor: reorganize folder structure and update imports across `user-service`
- Moved `Command`, `Validators`, and `DTO` files to appropriate `Domain`/`Application` subdirectories. - Adjusted imports to align with the new structure. - Removed debug `console.log` statements from `CreateUserCommandHandler`.

refactor: reorganize DTO, Command, and Validator folders in `user-service`
- Moved `DTO` files to `Application/DTO/ToCommand`. - Relocated `Command` and `Validator` files under `Domain/Command`. - Updated corresponding import paths across affected services and handlers.

refactor: reorganize and update imports for `DeleteUserService` and `EditUserCommand` components
- Moved `DTO`, `Command`, and `Validator` files to appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Adjusted import paths in corresponding services and handlers.

refactor: restructure and update imports in `EditUserService` and related components
- Moved `DTO`, `Command`, and `Validators` to appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Adjusted import paths across affected files. - Added `NegativePoints` error to `ErrorCatalog`.

refactor: reorganize and update imports in `GetUserService` and related components
- Moved `DTO`, `Validators`, and `Query` files to appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Updated import paths across affected services, handlers, and view models.

refactor: reorganize and update imports for `LoginSessionCommand` components
- Relocated `ValueObjects` and `DTO` files to appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Updated import paths in relevant validators, handlers, and repository interfaces. - Replaced `VerificationService` with `UserService` in `index.ts`.

refactor: reorganize and update imports for `LogoutUserService` and `LoginUserService`
- Moved `DTO`, `Command`, and `Validator` files to appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Updated import paths across affected services and handlers.

refactor: add `UpdateStatsService` functionality and reorganize related files
- Introduced `UserService`'s `UpdateStatsService` and `VerifyIfUserExistsByUuidsService`. - Implemented `UpdateStatsCommand`, `DTO`, `Validator`, and `Handler` classes for user stats updates. - Organized `DTO`, `Command`, and `Validator` files into appropriate `Application` and `Domain` subdirectories. - Updated import paths within affected components.

refactor: replace `VerificationService` with `UserService` and reorganize imports
- Removed `VerificationService` and replaced it with `UserService`. - Added new methods to `UserRepository` for handling username-based operations. - Implemented `UpdateStats` functionality in `UserController` and updated routes. - Organized `DTO` and `ViewModel` paths to follow `Application` hierarchy. - Updated import paths across affected files.

feat: add anonymous user support in `CreateUserCommand` flow
- Introduced `annonymous` property in `CreateUserCommand` and `CreateUserDTO`. - Added `AddEmailWithHash` method in `EmailVO` to handle hashed email logic for anonymous users. - Updated `CreateUserCommandHandler` to use hashed emails when the user is anonymous. - Modified `UserController` and related components to handle the new property.

feat: add anonymous user support to `EditUserCommand` flow
- Introduced `anonymous` property in `EditUserCommand` and `EditUserDTO`. - Updated `EditUserCommandHandler` to handle hashed emails for anonymous users. - Modified `UserController` and related components to support the new property.

feat: add support for multi-player updates in match history and stats flow
- Extended `CreateHistoryCommand` to handle up to four players. - Updated `CreateHistoryCommandHandler` to manage multi-player entities and stats. - Replaced `AddWinLoseForUser` with `UpdateStatsForUsers` in `BackendApiClient`. - Introduced `UpdateStatsExternalDTO` for streamlined off-platform stats updates.

feat: extend history functionality to support up to four players
- Updated `CreateHistoryValidator` to validate multi-player scenarios, including duplicate players and negative points. - Enhanced `CreateHistoryDTO` and `History` entity to accommodate player 3 and player 4 details. - Adjusted `HistoryController` to handle additional player data.

feat: extend multi-player support in history and stats flow
- Updated `HistoryRepository` and related methods to handle player 3 and player 4 data. - Added `UpdateStatsExternalDTO` to support multi-player stats updates. - Modified `UpdateStatsDTO` and Prisma schema to incorporate additional player fields.

feat: add support for nullable UUIDs and refine multi-player stats updates
- Updated `UserController` and routes to handle nullable UUIDs in the user existence check. - Added schema validation for `updateStats` endpoint to support nullable data for players 3 and 4. - Refined `UserRepository` to filter and validate UUIDs before querying the database.

feat: add nullable UUID support in user existence check
- Updated `VerifyIfUsersExistsByUuidsQuery` and `DTO` to accept nullable UUIDs. - Enhanced type safety in user verification queries.

feat: add query and handler for verifying user existence by username
- Introduced `VerifyIfUserExistsByUsernameQuery` to facilitate user existence checks. - Added `VerifyUserExistsByUsernameQueryHandler` for handling the query logic.

MESSAGE.value:
feat: enhance matchmaking logic in `UserRepository` and add `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO`
- Updated `SearchForClosestOpponent` to refine candidate selection based on win ratio differences. - Implemented a fallback `SearchForAnyOpponent` method for broader matchmaking. - Added `mapToUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` for structured matchmaking data mapping. - Introduced `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` to support detailed matchmaking query responses.

feat: update matchmaking DTOs and queries to support total games and username
- Replaced `uuid` with `username` in `GenerateMatchmakingDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingQuery`. - Added `totalGames` property to DTOs and queries for enhanced matchmaking logic. - Updated `BackendApiClient` with new methods for user verification and opponent search. - Added `NegativeValues` error to `ErrorCatalog` for input validation.

refactor: replace `HistoryRepository` with `BackendApiClient` in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and update validation
- Updated `Handler` to use `BackendApiClient` for opponent search and user validation. - Extended input validation to include `totalGames` check. - Replaced `uuid` with `username` in user validation and opponent search methods.

refactor: update `UserRepository` and `MatchmakingService` for improved matchmaking logic
- Removed unnecessary `parameterLoses` from `SearchForClosestOpponent`

refactor: simplify `SearchForClosestOpponent` and enhance `MatchmakingService`
- Removed unnecessary `paremterLoses` parameter from `SearchForClosestOpponent`. - Refactored `MatchmakingService` to include enhanced query validation and error handling. - Updated `Generate` method to return detailed matchmaking results using `GetUserMatchmakingViewModel`.
refactor: remove unused `GenerateMatchmakingQueryDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingViewModel` classes

refactor: switch matchmaking input from body to query parameters
- Updated `GenerateMatchmaking` method in `MatchmakingController` to use query parameters instead of request body. - Adjusted `MatchmakingRoutes` to reflect the new query-based input. - Enhanced input validation with querystring schema in `MatchmakingRoutes`.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
feat: add query and handler for verifying user existence by username
- Introduced `VerifyIfUserExistsByUsernameQuery` to facilitate user existence checks. - Added `VerifyUserExistsByUsernameQueryHandler` for handling the query logic.
